articles.author: SAM MEDNICK
articles.title: Niger's junta rulers ask for help from Russian group Wagner as it faces military intervention threat - The Associated Press
articles.description: An analyst says Niger’s new military junta has asked for help from the Russian mercenary group Wagner as the deadline nears for it to release the country’s ousted president or face possible military intervention by the West African regional bloc. A journalist…
articles.content: NIAMEY, Niger (AP) Nigers new military junta has asked for help from the Russian mercenary group Wagner as the deadline nears for it to release the countrys ousted president or face possible military… [+5256 chars]
